VERY addictive, VERY competitive game and one of the most popular E-Sports titles to date. Would definitely recommend getting this game. I've ran into so many friendly, caring people who support you, seems strange due to the fact that this game is known for the dedication of the players and how many tryhards there are, But nonetheless enjoyable, and I bet you would enjoy it as well.
